name: Mamamade
slogan: Creating tools that make raising little ones easier, healthier, more social and more fulfilling

jobs.title: Social Media + Content Executive (Internship)
jobs.description:
We're the fastest-growing baby food subscription company in the UK and we are looking for a social media master to join our team!

This is a fantastic opportunity to help shape the culture + strategy of a startup revolutionising commercial baby food as we know it. 

Part-time/freelance basis with possibility to turn into a full-time role.

The role will oversee all of Mamamade’s content execution on social media to benefit and grow our community online. This role will also include building relationships with other brands and influencers as well as nurturing other streams such as in-person events. You’ll be empowered to take an active role in content strategy and creation and will be encouraged to help develop our processes from the outset. 

No need to know a thing about babies or food - but must be creative, hungry to grow and eager to get stuck in and be a part of a fast-growing, fast-moving organisation committed to providing a better start for new parents and babies
